message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make it yours for $10000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $9000. How about we meet in the middle at $10500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $10500 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product! I can see you're a serious buyer. How about we meet at $11000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11000 is getting close to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10200?
